_header: Lady sweet and mild / for love of thine child
Note: Cf. 6603 for other version; also formerly 465.3.
Subjects: Virgin Mary, miracles of; monks; Ave Maria ; miracles
_description: A miracle of the Virgin Mary, how Our Lady’s Psalter was found — in 6-line stanzas

BodLauLat95.First Lines: …Be her of wel scillePrey mid gode wille…
BodLauLat95.Last Lines: …He mote vs alle bringgeto heuene swyþe sone
BodLauLat95.Note: Fragment of 60 lines; begins imperfectly at line 169.
BodLauLat95.Editions:
Napier,  Arthur Sampson. 
             “Odds and Ends.” 
             Modern Language Notes
         4 (1889): 137-40: 137, 275-6.

BodDig86.First Lines:
Leuedi swete and mildeFor loue of þine
                    childe…

NLS1921.First Lines:
Leuedi swete & mildeffor loue of þine
                    childe…
NLS1921.Last Lines: …He mot ous alle bringTo blis swiþe sone
